resources.string: This application is still under development. If any bugs are found please contact me.
Please login with your Google Account
Hold you phone in a horizontal position and point the top of the arrow towards the location you want the photo to be from.
Press next when you are ready.
There was an error fetching user data.
You need to log in first to upload a photo.
Τhere were no photos matching your current location, you can try again from a different one.
There was an error uploading the photo\'s information to the server. Please try again.
There was an error trying to upload the photo to the server. Please try again.
Photo was upload to server successfully!
There was a problem communicating with the server. Please try again.
If you wish you can add a name and description to your photo.
"Sorry, your device does no support any camera application"
There was a problem capturing the image. Please try again.
Uploading data to server, please wait.
Uploading photo to server, please wait.
There was a problem creating the image file. Please Try again.
The size of the photo is too big. Αdjust your camera setings and try again.
Hold you phone in a horizontal position and point the top of the arrow towards the location your photo will be from.
Now that the location\'s informations have been recorded, the next step is to take the photograph.
An internet connection and GPS services are required.\nTurn them on and try again.
An internet connection is required.\nTurn WiFi or cellular data on and try again.
GPS services are required.\nPlease turn GPS on and try again.
There seems to have been a problem in collecting all necessary data.\nPlease try again.
There seems to have been a problem signing in, please go back and try loging in again.
Your device does not seem to have the appropriate sensors to support the application.
Your device does not support gps services which are required by the applcation.
